downloadTitle: MVP Session 3 - Get started with shapes in Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Watch a brief demonstration of tips and tricks for working with shapes in Visio 2010.
detailsSection: Learn how to create diagrams more quickly by working with shapes in Microsoft Visio 2010. This video reviews several tips for working with shapes more effectively by using keyboard and pointer shortcuts and new features of Visio 2010. It covers shortcuts for duplicating objects, tips for rotating objects, a feature that lets you “glue” shapes to a connection point, and the new Quick Shapes menu, which enables you to quickly add related shapes to a diagram. This video is part of a series covering the basics of how to use Visio features and capabilities. Visio http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions to learn more and view other videos in this series.
installInstructionSection: The video has two downloadable resolution: 1000k/lowest and 8000k/highest. Click Download to save the video to your computer.
